message: Hi guys. Does anyone have any caps from the iPad Today 34 pre-show? Leo was showing the plans for the new TWiT studios, but I only tuned in as he was putting them away. Looked awesome, but can't find it anywhere!
Managed to find it recorded on justin.tv. If anyone wants to see it: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJ9OpiZhsu0
Thanks for shareing. Loved it I love iPad today great show
Why re-upload? Just link to the Justintv video
@jordanhowell Thanks for posting this as I haven't seen it before.  Another great reason I'm enjoying convore!  Although I always get that damn "convoy" song in my head.
@craigrood It took me long enough to find, I thought I'd save others the trouble.
thank you very much, I missed this on twit live, too
@jordanhowell JustinTV urls can be shared, I dont get why you needed to download, cut and re-upload instead of a copy-paste job.
Why is it such a big deal? It's saving people the trouble and took no time out of my day, so I'm not bothered. Here's the link, you find the time. http://www.justin.tv/twit/b/280323112
'We could also put up signs that say "Don't talk to Tom"' = 'if wiggles website is saved on talk to time'
For added giggles try turning on Googles closed captions *g*
For anyone that wants to see; Roger C. Ambrose has posted a load of his mock-ups on his Facebook page (http://www.facebook.com/rogerambrose?sk=wall). Scroll down quite a way and you'll find them!
Good tip, the gallery is here, but you have to be logged it to facebook apparently: http://www.facebook.com/album.php?fbid=10150160355626255&id=764956254&aid=335305
